title: S9 E2: Perfectly Single
description:
Ardie was able to convince Danielle to trust him when her family questioned his behavior. But when a detective reached out to Danielle with his own suspicions, Danielle started to wonder if Ardie was telling her the whole truth.


Follow @SomethingWasWrongPodcast on Instagram
